outline:
1. to deal fully with, recompense
    1. (Qal)
      1. to deal out to, do to
      2. to deal bountifully with
      3. to recompense, repay, requite
    2. (Qal) to wean a child (Niphal) to be weaned
    3. (Qal) to ripen, bear ripe (almonds)
kjv_def: bestow on, deal bountifully, do (good), recompense, requite, reward, ripen, [phrase] serve, mean, yield.
strongs_def: to treat a person (well or ill), i.e. benefit or requite; by implication (of toil), to ripen, i.e. (specifically) to wean
